title: Team GB's Matt Weston leads skeleton standings after two runs at Winter Olympics
desc: Matt Weston underlined his status as the world's best skeleton pilot by setting the track record on his way to taking a significant halfway lead at the Winter Olympics.

title: US-Iran can reach nuclear compromise, Hakan Fidan says
